0E456506.Line20.5421B: That is a painful tale. Before known history, the children of Bul-Kathos protected the steppes, all to be undone by one coward.

A839DE88.Line22.5421B: The clans scattered after Arreat’s destruction. Many of those clans do not exist anymore. I hope our deeds now help redeem us.

FB3FFC35.MenuLabel: “Why is the Crane Tribe settled here?”
